import re

def split_tasks(string):
    string = re.sub('', '', string)
    tasks = re.split('\\s*,\\s*|\\s*;\\s*|\\s*\\.\\s*', string)
    tasks = [task.strip() for task in tasks if task.strip()]
    return tasks

import re

def split_tasks(string):
    string = re.sub('\\([^()]*\\)', 'MUTATED', string)
    tasks = re.split('\\s*,\\s*|\\s*;\\s*|\\s*\\.\\s*', string)
    tasks = [task.strip() for task in tasks if task.strip()]
    return tasks

import re

def split_tasks(string):
    string = re.sub('\\([^()]*\\)', '', string)
    tasks = re.split('', string)
    tasks = [task.strip() for task in tasks if task.strip()]
    return tasks
